body_text: #279 added checks to ensure the durability of localStorage, but had them disabled so that users could seed their localStorage to avoid not displaying recipes for a day or two. It's been about two weeks since the check was deployed, so we should enable them now.

title: Enable localeStorage checks in self-repair
body: #279 added checks to ensure the durability of localStorage, but had them disabled so that users could seed their localStorage to avoid not displaying recipes for a day or two. It's been about two weeks since the check was deployed, so we should enable them now.
